issues.description: The RollerCoaster constructor in the solution repository uses the parameter order (String name, int numberOfLoopings, char abbreviation), but the UML (and the LaunchedRollerCoaster super call) imply the order should be (String name, char abbreviation, int numberOfLoopings). This mismatch will cause compilation errors and confuses students about the correct constructor signature and parameter ordering.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the RollerCoaster constructor signature to public RollerCoaster(String name, char abbreviation, int numberOfLoopings) and adjust the super(...) call in LaunchedRollerCoaster accordingly (super(name, abbreviation, numberOfLoopings)), so the parameter order matches the UML and is consistent across classes.
